sentence: Unless  your  cholesterol  level  is  off  the  scale  (by  which  I  mean  approaching  double  figures  when  measured  in  millimoles  per  litre),  the  degree  of  change  in  absolute  coronary  risk  that  you  can  bring  about  by  dietary  measures  is  spitting  in  the  wind.
label: I
